0110001010010111 0111101101000010 1 -> sum: 1101110111011010, cout: 0
0110110010001001 1000010011011110 1 -> sum: 1111000101101000, cout: 0
1010001000001110 1101001110110001 0 -> sum: 0111010110111111, cout: 1
1101011011111101 1011000110010100 0 -> sum: 1000100010010001, cout: 1
1001110101001111 0010001011000000 1 -> sum: 1100000000010000, cout: 0
0110110100010111 1000110000110011 1 -> sum: 1111100101001011, cout: 0
0000000000000000 0000000000000000 0 -> sum: 0000000000000000, cout: 0
